title: ACS Finance Bhardawaj chairs UTLMC of REGP;Subsidy amount of Rs 25 crore released during previous year under the employment programme - Cross Town News
content: ACS Finance Bhardawaj chairs UTLMC of REGP;Subsidy amount of Rs 25 crore released during previous year under the employment programme  Cross Town News
description: SRINAGAR, MAY 16: Additional Chief Secretary, Finance, Vivek Bhardawaj who is also hold the charge of Administrative Secretary, Industries and Commerce Department today held the UT Level Monitoring Committee (UTLMC) meeting of JK Rural Employment Generation Programme (JKREGP).
